meanings.definition: The quality or state of being daily.
meanings.sent1: The dailinesses of the sunrise brings a sense of routine to each morning.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the dailinesses of her daily walks around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The dailinesses of brushing teeth before bed can sometimes feel like a mini adventure.
meanings.sent4: The dailinesses of the changing seasons remind us of the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The dailinesses of the ticking clock echoed through the empty room.

meanings.definition: The routine or habitual nature of daily life.
meanings.sent1: In the dailinesses of his work routine, he found a sense of purpose.
meanings.sent2: The dailinesses of cooking dinner every evening can become a comforting ritual.
meanings.sent3: She chuckled at the dailinesses of her cat demanding breakfast at the same time every day.
meanings.sent4: The dailinesses of the city streets bustling with activity painted a vivid picture of urban life.
meanings.sent5: The dailinesses of the chirping birds outside her window signaled the start of a new day.
